name: Kagami (Raaghav Prabahar)
description: A 2D Horror Platformer that unravels the story of little Niina and her adventure in Paradise Land collecting cherries, however it is not late before you realize it is not completely what meets the eye. This is my first game and it took me around 3 weeks to finish this. Kagami is heavily inspired from classic platformers such as Super Mario Bros and Sonic. Why you should play this game is simply because the most mind blowing part about the game is that it is not just a game. ;)
